ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.

567 A.2d 1040
ACTION, INC. v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD. Appeal of Marilyn B. TALERICO, on Behalf of Donald P. TALERICO (Decedent).

Argued Dec. 11, 1989.
Decided Jan. 5, 1990.

Michael P. Shay, Bethlehem, for Action, Inc.

Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
